meta.description: Fun Fibonacci number generator for children. Click on the buttons to see the next number. Playfully learn about the Fibonacci numbers.
meta.title: Fun Fibonacci number generator for kids

modal-info.title: What are Fibonacci numbers?
modal-info.body:
The Fibonacci sequence is a sequence in which each number is the sum of the two preceding ones. Individual numbers in the Fibonacci sequence are known as Fibonacci numbers. The sequence commonly starts from 0 and 1, although some authors start the sequence from 1 and 1 or sometimes (as did Fibonacci) from 1 and 2.

The Fibonacci sequence is defined by the recurrence relation for and for initial numbers: .

That means in words:

  • The value 1 is specified for the first two numbers.
  • Each subsequent number is the sum of its two predecessors in the sequence.
Read more on Wikipedia
